title: Madeleine Albright, First Woman to Serve as U.S. Secretary of State, Dies at 84 - The Wall Street Journal
content: Madeleine Albright, First Woman to Serve as U.S. Secretary of State, Dies at 84  The Wall Street JournalView Full Coverage on Google News
description: As the nation’s top diplomat during the Clinton administration, she presided over U.S. diplomacy in the aftermath of the Cold War, renegotiating the nation’s relationship with Russia and advocating the enlargement of NATO by including former Soviet states.
